meanings.definition: The quality or state of being green in color
meanings.sent1: The viridity of the leaves in the garden was so refreshing.
meanings.sent2: I love the viridity of the grass after a rainy day.
meanings.sent3: The viridity of the paint made the room feel like a forest.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled with the viridity of emeralds.
meanings.sent5: The viridity of the meadow was a sight to behold.
